## Overview

This collaborative project explores music recommendation systems using Spotify data, applying advanced machine learning techniques to understand user preferences and improve playlist personalization.

### Project Highlights

- **Collaborative Work**: Group project showcasing teamwork and technical communication
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Analysis of user listening patterns and music features
- **Machine Learning**: Implementation of recommendation algorithms
- **Interactive Visualizations**: Dynamic charts and dashboards for exploring results
